text: Josh Harris (born April 27, 1989) is an American football long snapper for the Atlanta Falcons of the National Football League. He played college football for Auburn University. He signed with the Falcons as an undrafted free agent in 2012. Harris attended Carrollton High School in Carrollton, Georgia. title: Josh Harris (long snapper)
